Review: I dunno with you but i think you're just wasting your time coming here.. you'll have to pay for a guide and go inside, my parents said it doesn't look safe.. well it was raining at that time.

Review Title: Not worth your time and money
Review: Not worth your time and money. There's practically nothing to see here except the landmark outside the cave.

I do not have a huge interest in WW11 history so this hideout for the Japanese was not overly interesting. There is a small number of displays in the lit cave. Admission is 50 pesos. A housing estate is being developed just beneath the cave...More

Review Title: Japanese Cave House, I'm coming back
Review: I have been to JCH in 2013 to hang out with co-workers turned friends. We had many meaningful experiences at Samal. Most of our adventures were unplanned, but the caretaker of JCV was the one who gave us directions on what to do while in...More
